name: 林子喬
objective:
Discuss the theories and features of kinds of AC electric machines, including (1) A Simple Loop in a Uniform Magnetic Field; (2) The Rotating Magnetic Field; (3) Induced Voltage and Torque in AC Machines; (4) Machine Power Flows and Losses; (5) Synchronous Generators; (6) Induction Motors.

探討各種電機特性及工作原理，內容包含：(1) 均勻磁場之單一線圈 (2) 旋轉磁場 (3) 交流電機的感應電壓與轉矩 (4) 電機功率潮流及損失 (5) 同步發電機 (6) 感應電動機 。
schedule:
Wk1: Course Introduction and Rules (課程簡介及上課規則)
Wk2~Wk6: AC Machinery Fundamentals (交流電機基本概念)
Wk7~Wk8: Synchronous Generators (同步發電機)
Wk9: Midterm Exam (期中考)
Wk10: Midterm Commentary & Synchronous Generators (期中考後試題檢討 & 同步發電機)
Wk11~Wk12: Synchronous Generators (同步發電機)
Wk13~Wk17: Induction Motors (感應電動機)
Wk18: Final Exam (期末考)
scorePolicy: (一)．Midterm (期中): 30%; (二)．Final (期末): 30%;  (三)．Attendance, Discussion, and so on (平時討論): 40%
